bibl.title: The Greek Documentary Papyri from Kellis (Ismant el-Kharab): An Interim Report.
The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: WORP, K.A.

bibl.note: Souligne l'importance et l'intérêt des papyrus grecs et coptes de Kellis. - Pp. 66-68: Inventaire (d'après la provenance et le contenu) des papyrus intégralement transcrits à cette date.
WORP K.A., The Greek Documentary Papyri from Kellis (Ismant el-Kharab): An Interim Report.
C.A. MARLOW and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 6 (Oxford, 2001) pp. 65-69.
